languages.text: "Ваша Светлость, на связи принцесса ван дер Ройсен! Молю, не останьтесь в стороне. Этот старый мерзавец, адмирал Саархол, готов погубить тысячи человек только чтобы заполучить меня! Он не вершит закон, а одержим личными желаниями! Он преследует меня много лет, склонил к согласию на свадьбу моего отца, и даже сейчас не готов отступиться! Прошу, защитите меня и горстку таких же как я борцов за свободу! Мы не желаем, чтобы нами помыкали тираны, подобные Саархолу!"

"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, this is Princess Lucretia van der Roycen. I beg you, do not remain on the sidelines. That old ruffian, Admiral Saarhol, is willing to kill thousands of people just to get me! He is not a force of justice, he is obsessed with his own personal desires! He has been stalking me for years, he got my father to agree to our wedding, and even now refuses to give up! Please protect me and the handful of freedom fighters like myself! We do not want to be ruled by tyrants like Saarhol!"
languages.original_text: "Ваша Светлость, на связи принцесса ван дер Ройсен! Молю, не останьтесь в стороне. Этот старый мерзавец, адмирал Саархол, готов погубить тысячи человек только чтобы заполучить меня! Он не вершит закон, а одержим личными желаниями! Он преследует меня много лет, склонил к согласию на свадьбу моего отца, и даже сейчас не готов отступиться! Прошу, защитите меня и горстку таких же как я борцов за свободу! Мы не желаем, чтобы нами помыкали тираны, подобные Саархолу!"

That old ruffian, Admiral Saarhol, is willing to kill thousands of people just to get me! He is not a force of justice, he is obsessed with his own personal desires! He has been stalking me for years, he got my father's to agree to our wedding, and even now refuses to give up! Please protect me and the handful of freedom fighters like myself! We do not want to be ruled by tyrants like Saarhol!"

That old ruffian, Admiral Saarhol, is willing to kill thousands of people just to get me! He is not a force of justice, he is obsessed with his own personal desires! He has been stalking me for years, he got my father to agree to our wedding, and even now refuses to give up! Please protect me and the handful of freedom fighters like myself! languages.text: "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, hier spricht Prinzessin Lucretia van der Roycen. Ich flehe Euch an, seht nicht untätig zu. Dieser alte Rüpel, Admiral Saarhol, ist bereit, Tausende von Leuten zu töten, um mich zu kriegen! Er kämpft nicht für Gerechtigkeit, sondern ist von seinen eigenen Begehrlichkeiten besessen! Er hat mit jahrelang nachgestellt, meinen Vater dazu gebracht, unserer Hochzeit zuzustimmen, und selbst jetzt weigert er sich, aufzugeben! Bitte beschützt mich und meine Freiheitskämpfer! Wir wollen nicht von Tyrannen wie Saarhol regiert werden!"
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, this is Princess Lucretia van der Roycen. I beg you, do not remain on the sidelines. That old ruffian, Admiral Saarhol, is willing to kill thousands of people just to get me! He is not a force of justice, he is obsessed with his own personal desires! He has been stalking me for years, he got my father to agree to our wedding, and even now refuses to give up! Please protect me and the handful of freedom fighters like myself! We do not want to be ruled by tyrants like Saarhol!"

Dieser alte Rüpel, Admiral Saarhol, ist bereit, Tausende von Leuten zu töten, um mich zu kriegen! Er kämpft nicht für Gerechtigkeit, sondern ist von seinen eigenen Begehrlichkeiten besessen! Er hat mit jahrelang nachgestellt, meinen Vater dazu gebracht, unserer Hochzeit zuzustimmen, und selbst jetzt weigert er sich, aufzugeben! Bitte beschützt mich und meine Freiheitskämpfer! Wir wollen nicht von Tyrannen wie Saarhol regiert werden!"

languages.text: « Votre Seigneurie, ici la princesse Lucrétia van der Roycen. Je vous supplie de bien vouloir intervenir. Ce vieux brigand d'amiral Saarhol est prêt à tuer des milliers d'innocents dans le seul but de me mettre la main dessus ! Il se moque éperdument de la justice, il cherche juste à assouvir ses désirs personnels ! Cela fait des années qu'il me pourchasse, il a réussi à convaincre mon père de lui accorder ma main et depuis, il n'en démord pas ! Par pitié, protégez-nous, moi et ces pauvres gens qui comme moi se battent pour la liberté ! Nous refusons d'être gouvernés par des tyrans comme Saarhol ! »
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, this is Princess Lucretia van der Roycen. I beg you, do not remain on the sidelines. That old ruffian, Admiral Saarhol, is willing to kill thousands of people just to get me! He is not a force of justice, he is obsessed with his own personal desires! He has been stalking me for years, he got my father to agree to our wedding, and even now refuses to give up! Please protect me and the handful of freedom fighters like myself! We do not want to be ruled by tyrants like Saarhol!"

traits.locale_text: « Votre Seigneurie, ici la princesse Lucrétia van der Roycen. Je vous supplie de bien vouloir intervenir. Ce vieux brigand d'amiral Saarhol est prêt à tuer des milliers d'innocents dans le seul but de me mettre la main dessus ! Il se moque éperdument de la justice, il cherche juste à assouvir ses désirs personnels ! Cela fait des années qu'il me pourchasse, il a réussi à convaincre mon père de lui accorder ma main et depuis, il n'en démord pas ! Par pitié, protégez-nous, moi et ces pauvres gens qui comme moi se battent pour la liberté ! Nous refusons d'être gouvernés par des tyrans comme Saarhol ! »

languages.text: «Mi{mf|lord|lady}, al habla la princesa Lucretia van der Roycen. Le ruego que no permanezca indiferente. ¡Ese viejo rufián, el almirante Saarhol, está dispuesto a matar a miles de personas solo para capturarme! No es un representante de la justicia, ¡está obsesionado con sus deseos personales! Lleva años persiguiéndome, consiguió que mi padre accediera a nuestro matrimonio ¡y sigue sin rendirse! ¡Por favor, le ruego que nos proteja a mi grupo de luchadores por la libertad y a mí! ¡Solo queremos ser libres de tiranos como Saarhol!».
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, this is Princess Lucretia van der Roycen. I beg you, do not remain on the sidelines. That old ruffian, Admiral Saarhol, is willing to kill thousands of people just to get me! He is not a force of justice, he is obsessed with his own personal desires! He has been stalking me for years, he got my father to agree to our wedding, and even now refuses to give up! Please protect me and the handful of freedom fighters like myself! We do not want to be ruled by tyrants like Saarhol!"

traits.locale_text: «Mi{mf|lord|lady}, al habla la princesa Lucretia van der Roycen. Le ruego que no permanezca indiferente. ¡Ese viejo rufián, el almirante Saarhol, está dispuesto a matar a miles de personas solo para capturarme! No es un representante de la justicia, ¡está obsesionado con sus deseos personales! Lleva años persiguiéndome, consiguió que mi padre accediera a nuestro matrimonio ¡y sigue sin rendirse! ¡Por favor, le ruego que nos proteja a mi grupo de luchadores por la libertad y a mí! ¡Solo queremos ser libres de tiranos como Saarhol!».

languages.text: 「陛下、こちらはプリンセス・ルクレティア・ファン・デル・ロイセン。お願いします、傍観なさらないでください。あの年寄の暴れん坊、サールホル提督は、私をとらえるためなら何千人者人間を殺すことも厭いません！彼は正義の味方ではありません。個人的な欲望に取りつかれているのです！何年もの間、私を付け回して、父に結婚を承諾させ、今なお諦めようとしないのです！どうか私と、同法である数人の自由の戦士たちをお守りください！サールホルのような暴君に支配されたくないのです！」
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, this is Princess Lucretia van der Roycen. I beg you, do not remain on the sidelines. That old ruffian, Admiral Saarhol, is willing to kill thousands of people just to get me! He is not a force of justice, he is obsessed with his own personal desires! He has been stalking me for years, he got my father to agree to our wedding, and even now refuses to give up! Please protect me and the handful of freedom fighters like myself! We do not want to be ruled by tyrants like Saarhol!"

traits.locale_text: 「陛下、こちらはプリンセス・ルクレティア・ファン・デル・ロイセン。お願いします、傍観なさらないでください。あの年寄の暴れん坊、サールホル提督は、私をとらえるためなら何千人者人間を殺すことも厭いません！彼は正義の味方ではありません。個人的な欲望に取りつかれているのです！何年もの間、私を付け回して、父に結婚を承諾させ、今なお諦めようとしないのです！どうか私と、同法である数人の自由の戦士たちをお守りください！サールホルのような暴君に支配されたくないのです！」

languages.text: “大人，我是卢克丽霞·冯·德·罗伊森公主。我求您了，不要袖手旁观。海军上将萨赫尔那个老混蛋，他为了抓我，不惜杀害成千上万的人！他根本不是什么正义分子，不过是沉迷于他自己的欲望而已！这么多年来，他一直都在疯狂地跟踪我。他说服我的父亲，让我父亲把我嫁给他，直到现在他都不肯放开我！求求您，保护我和像我这样的自由战士吧！我们不想沦为萨赫尔这种暴君的奴隶！”
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, this is Princess Lucretia van der Roycen. I beg you, do not remain on the sidelines. That old ruffian, Admiral Saarhol, is willing to kill thousands of people just to get me! He is not a force of justice, he is obsessed with his own personal desires! He has been stalking me for years, he got my father to agree to our wedding, and even now refuses to give up! Please protect me and the handful of freedom fighters like myself! We do not want to be ruled by tyrants like Saarhol!"

traits.locale_text: “大人，我是卢克丽霞·冯·德·罗伊森公主。我求您了，不要袖手旁观。海军上将萨赫尔那个老混蛋，他为了抓我，不惜杀害成千上万的人！他根本不是什么正义分子，不过是沉迷于他自己的欲望而已！这么多年来，他一直都在疯狂地跟踪我。他说服我的父亲，让我父亲把我嫁给他，直到现在他都不肯放开我！求求您，保护我和像我这样的自由战士吧！我们不想沦为萨赫尔这种暴君的奴隶！”

languages.text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, Lucretia van der Roycen konuşuyor. Size yalvarıyorum olan biteni kenardan izlemeyin. Amiral Saarhol denen o ihtiyar kabadayı, sırf bana ulaşmak için binlerce kişiyi öldürmeyi göze almış! Adaleti temsil eden birisi değil, şahsi arzularının esiri olmuş! Senelerdir beni takip ediyor. Babamı evlenmemize ikna etti ama hâlâ vazgeçmek bilmiyor! Lütfen beni ve tıpkı benim gibi özgürlük peşinde koşan yanımdaki bir avuç savaşçıyı koruyun! Saarhol gibi tiranlar tarafından yönetilmek istemiyoruz!"
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, this is Princess Lucretia van der Roycen. I beg you, do not remain on the sidelines. That old ruffian, Admiral Saarhol, is willing to kill thousands of people just to get me! He is not a force of justice, he is obsessed with his own personal desires! He has been stalking me for years, he got my father to agree to our wedding, and even now refuses to give up! Please protect me and the handful of freedom fighters like myself! We do not want to be ruled by tyrants like Saarhol!"
